items.title: C-Chain Transaction Format
items.description: This page is an overview of the Coreth atomic transaction format associated with LuxGo C-Chain API.

items.title: Contract Chain API
items.description: This page is an overview of the C-Chain API associated with LuxGo.

items.title: The Primary Network
items.description: Lux features 3 built-in blockchains which includes Exchange Chain (X-Chain), Platform Chain (P-Chain), and Contract Chain (C-Chain). More info here.
